data.eml:eml: A new species of Bachia Gray, 1845 (Squamata: Gymnophthalmidae) from the Eastern Brazilian Cerrado, and data on its ecology, physiology and behavior

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jr, Mauro Teixeira, Recoder, Renato Sousa, Camacho, Agustín, Sena, Marco Aurélio De, Navas, Carlos Arturo, Rodrigues, Miguel Trefaut (2013): A new species of Bachia Gray, 1845 (Squamata: Gymnophthalmidae) from the Eastern Brazilian Cerrado, and data on its ecology, physiology and behavior. Zootaxa 3616 (2): 173-189, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.2.6
